AUTHOR: Author
TOAST_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Customize your toasts the way you want them.
UPDATER_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Upcoming updates will appear here when they're pushed.
UPDATER_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: We faced an error updating one of the addons, due to you having unstaged changes.
UPDATER_FETCHING_DESCRIPTION: Please be patient while we fetch the latest updates for your addons.
UPDATER_UPDATING_DESCRIPTION: Please be patient while install the latest updates for your addons.
UPDATER_NEW_UPDATES_DESCRIPTION: Procceed by clicking the update button below.
UPDATER_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: The updater is disabled, you won't get any new updates.
UPDATES_IDLE_TITLE: Wumpus doesn't have any updates for you!
UPDATES_IDLE_TEXT: Feel free to lay back and relax, we will notify you when updates become available.
UPDATES_SEARCHING_TEXT: Please be patient as we push any found updates to this area.
UPDATES_DISABLED_DESC: You have disabled updates, any new updates will not show here and you won't be able to fetch any.
UPDATE_RESTART_DESC: Core updates require Unbound to restart to complete installing. Note that, this isn't a full app reload, it will only restart Unbound which will take up to a second.
